description: This file defines a React functional component called Banner, which implements an auto-rotating carousel showcasing featured products from a data source. It utilizes React hooks such as useState, useEffect, and useMemo for state management, side effects, and optimizing rendering. The component renders a carousel with navigation dots, product images, and links to view product details or explore the catalog.

methods.name: Banner()
methods.description: React functional component that renders an auto-rotating product carousel.
